1.name: Basic loot box
1.description: Contains mostly traditional cards and modifiers
1.details:
2% chance of getting a special card
5% chance of getting a modifier card
4% chance of getting a Joker
1% chance of getting a Neon Joker
88% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

2.name: Advanced loot box
2.description: Can contain a special card or joker
2.details:
4% chance of getting a special card
10% chance of getting a modifier card
8% chance of getting a Joker
2% chance of getting a Neon Joker
76% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

3.name: Jokers loot box
3.description: More chances of getting a Joker
3.details:
15% chance of getting a Joker
1% chance of getting a Neon Joker
84% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 3

4.name: Specials loot box

4.details:
15% chance of getting a special card
20% chance of getting a modifier
65% chance of getting a traditional card

5.name: Modifiers loot box
5.details:

50% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 5

6.name: Figures loot box
6.details:

7.name: The Deceitful Joker loot box
7.details:
1 guaranteed Joker
6% chance of getting a Joker
2% chance of getting a Neon Joker
92% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 3

8.name: The Lovers loot box
8.description: All hearts suited cards, can contain special cards and modifiers.
8.details:
45% chance of getting a traditional Heart card
30% chance of getting Ace of Hearts
10% chance of getting Neon Heart card
10% chance of getting Heart Suit modifier
5% chance of getting 'All cards to heart' special
Loot box size 5

9.name: Special Bet loot box
9.description: Small loot box with chances of getting a special card or modifier
9.details:
5% chance of getting a special card
10% chance of getting a modifier
85% chance of getting a traditional card
Loot box size 3

10.name: Neon loot box
10.description: An exclusive loot box with chances of getting neon cards
10.details:

3% chance of getting a Neon Joker 
Loot box size 5
